Posts.EditableText:
I am unable to upload files to the forum. Tried with both Firefox and IE, and I am using a PC that I have done this from in the past. Tried three different .aslx files, the biggest is 12 kB. I just get a yellow triangle with a ! in the status column.

Anyone else having the same problem?

Posts.EditableText: Same problem with chrome. The status says : "Sorry, the board attachment quota has been reached."
Posts.HTML: Same problem with chrome. The status says : "Sorry, the board attachment quota has been reached."

Posts.EditableText: Ah, I didn't know phpBB had such a thing as an attachment quota. I've removed that now so uploads now work again.
Posts.HTML: Ah, I didn't know phpBB had such a thing as an attachment quota. I've removed that now so uploads now work again.
